title: Shalmar- A Tale of Lifetimes II
description: After recovering the magical Tarlaeth and ensuring the mages remain in exile, Shalmar returns to Blyst to celebrate the victory.The victory is short lived. She is visited by a lone rider with haunting questions of her past.After discovering her mind sweep, she begins a quest to find the family she had forgotten, the elemental powers bestowed on her and a body snatcher who threatens to destroy her world.
author: Serena Whynd
